page.title: 04Guides/Brownies in Kirton
page.content: There are nineteen girls who belong to {First Kirton Guides }. There are five patrols , Rose ,Daffodil , Thistle , Forget-me-not and Poppy . Guides is held on Wednesday nights from 7:00 till 8:30 . The meeting is held at a hut near the old school . The guides wear a blue blouse , skirt and hat . { First Kirton Brownies}meet at a hut near the old school . It is held on Tuesdays from 6:00 p.m till 7:15 p.m . There are 25 brownies altogether 6 brownies in a six .The sixes are called Sprites , Elves , Imps and Pixies . They often go on outings , parades , treasure hunts and things like that . They also do work in little booklets .
